TILE.name: Today Single Unprocessed
TILE.where: (processed=false AND is_group = false AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date)

TILE.name: Today Single Actioned
TILE.where: (processed=true AND is_group = false AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date)

TILE.name: Todays Single Cancelled
TILE.where: (is_group = false AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date AND pax_cancelled = true)

TILE.name: Today Group Unprocessed
TILE.where: (processed=false AND is_group = true AND group_contact =true AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date)

TILE.name: Today Group Actioned
TILE.where: (processed=true AND is_group = true AND group_contact =true AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date)

TILE.name: Group Todays Pax
TILE.where: (is_group = true AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date AND group_contact =true)

TILE.name: Group Todays Cancelled
TILE.where: (is_group = true AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date AND pax_cancelled = true)

TILE.name: Tomorrow Single Cancelled
TILE.where: (is_group = false AND pax_cancelled = true AND pickup_date = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date +1))

TILE.name: Tomorrow Group Unprocessed
TILE.where: (processed=false AND is_group = true AND group_contact =true AND pickup_date = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date + 1))

TILE.name: Tomorrow Group Actioned
TILE.where: (processed=true AND is_group = true AND group_contact =true AND pickup_date = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date + 1))

TILE.name: Tomorrow Group Cancelled
TILE.where: ( is_group = true AND pax_cancelled = true AND group_contact =true AND pickup_date = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date + 1))

GRID.name: Today's Pax
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND processed = false AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date AND pax_cancelled = false)

GRID.name: Today's Actioned
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND processed = true AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date AND pax_cancelled = false)

GRID.name: Tomorrow's Pax
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND processed = false AND pax_cancelled = false AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date + 1)

GRID.name: Tomorrow's Actioned
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND processed = true AND pax_cancelled = false AND pickup_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date + 1)

GRID.name: Unprocessed Pax
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND processed = false AND pax_cancelled = false)

GRID.name: Processed Pax
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND processed = true AND pax_cancelled = false)

GRID.name: Today's Past 4
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND booking_date::date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date AND pax_cancelled = false AND booking_date::time > '1600'::time)

GRID.name: Open Transfer Assignments
GRID.where: (closed=false AND pax_cancelled = false)

GRID.name: Consultants Today's
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND booking_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP::date)

GRID.name: Bookings
GRID.where: (is_group = false)

GRID.name: Cancelled Pax
GRID.where: (is_group = false AND pax_cancelled = true)

GRID.name: Outbox
GRID.where: (folder_id = 0) AND (address_group_id is null)

GRID.name: Add Address
GRID.where: table_name = 'sms'

GRID.name: Group SMS
GRID.where: (folder_id = 0) AND (address_group_id is not null)

GRID.name: Sent
GRID.where: folder_id = 2

GRID.name: Inbox
GRID.where: folder_id = 3

GRID.name: Action
GRID.where: folder_id = 4

GRID.name: Unprocessed Transfer Passengers
GRID.orderby: pickup_date ASC, pickup_date ASC, pickup_time ASC
GRID.where: (processed= false AND pax_cancelled = false)

JASPER.name: Voucher
JASPER.file.sql: SELECT 'Transfer Voucher_' || passanger_name || '-' || pickup_date FROM vw_passangers WHERE passanger_id =

GRID.name: Processed Transfer Passengers
GRID.where: (processed= true)

GRID.name: Passengers Depatures
GRID.where: (tab=1 AND processed= false)

GRID.name: Passengers Arrivals
GRID.where: (tab=2 AND processed= false)
